attributes.action: Posthumously award Stan Laurel a Knighthood
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Stan laurel and Oliver Hardy have remained the most famous and popular screen double act in the history of cinema.  They have been described by Uncut as 'cinema's most graceful and strangely beautiful clowns'.  

Stan Laurel was a British comedian/writer who took comedy to another level, in his genius we find the roots of all of the comedy we know and love today, his sublime talent has entertained generations of people all over the world, creativity at its peak.  The situations that unravel hilariously before your eyes leaves you in complete awe of the talent that wrote it....and in the vast majority of cases it was Stan Laurel.  The Knighthood given to Charlie Chaplin was deserved but there was another clown who changed the course of entertainment worldwide.....Stan Laurel.  It has been too long, now we have the chance to make amends.  Vote for Stan Laurel.

rejection.details: Sorry, we're no longer accepting posthumous honour petitions
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
